Prop.Name: Lock
Prop.Description: True to initially render this column as locked. Columns which are locked must specify a fixed width. They do NOT support a width expressed in percentage nor AutoResize.

Prop.Name: Resizable
Prop.Description: False to disable column resizing. Defaults to true.

Prop.Name: Sortable
Prop.Description: True if sorting is to be allowed on this column. Check the value of {@link gxui.GridExtension#RemoteSort} property, because by default, it is set to sort on the server side, and this needs extra programming. To sort on the client side, set {@link gxui.GridExtension#RemoteSort} = False.

Prop.Name: Hidden
Prop.Description: True to initially render the column hidden.

Prop.Name: Hideable
Prop.Description: Specify as false to prevent the user from hiding this column (defaults to true).

Prop.Name: MenuDisabled
Prop.Description: True to disable the column menu. Defaults to false.

Prop.Name: AutoExpand
Prop.Description: True if this column should expand to fill unused space in the grid. Deprecated set Width=100% instead.

Prop.Name: SummaryType
Prop.Description: Function to use when calculating the summary of a column (only applies when {@link gxui.GridExtension#ShowGroupingSummary grouping summary} is enabled in the grid.)

Prop.Name: HeaderGroup
Prop.Description: If specified, this column is rendered inside a parent header whose text is the one specified in this property. All the columns with the same HeaderGroup value are shown inside the same header group.
